text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse Obviously @realDonaldTrump is not in control of his own administration much less the #coronavirus pandemic, the economy or anything else. Trump is a TOTAL FAILURE on every front #FindSomethingNew #VoteJoeBidenToSaveAmerica
